item.title: [cmr] Miara, Thorn of the Glade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Maalfeld Twins
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

item.title: [cmr] Murder
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Pride of the Perfect
item.description:
Enchantment

Elves you control get +2/+0.

item.title: [cmr] Supernatural Stamina
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

item.title: [cmr] Revenant
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Viscera Seer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Boarding Party
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

Haste

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [cmr] Burning Anger
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target."

item.title: [cmr] Champion of the Flame
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Trample

Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

item.title: [cmr] Court of Ire
item.description:
Enchantment

When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage to that player or permanent instead.

item.title: [cmr] Crimson Fleet Commodore
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Pirate

Trample

When Crimson Fleet Commodore enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

item.title: [cmr] Explosion of Riches
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, Explosion of Riches deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.

item.title: [cmr] Dragon Egg
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Egg

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

item.title: [cmr] Fathom Fleet Swordjack
item.description:
Creature — Orc Pirate

Whenever Fathom Fleet Swordjack attacks, it deals damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking equal to the number of artifacts you control.

Encore {5}{R} ({5}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Fiery Cannonade
item.description:
Instant

Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

item.title: [cmr] Frenzied Saddlebrute
item.description:
Creature — Orc Warrior

Haste

All creatures can attack your opponents and planeswalkers your opponents control as though those creatures had haste.

item.title: [cmr] Impulsive Pilferer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Pirate

When Impulsive Pilferer dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Encore {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Goblin Trailblazer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Pirate

Menace

item.title: [cmr] Lightning-Rig Crew
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Pirate

{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.

item.title: [cmr] Portent of Betrayal
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Renegade Tactics
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature can't block this turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Rummaging Goblin
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Rogue

{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Ripscale Predator
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [cmr] Skyraker Giant
item.description:
Creature — Giant

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [cmr] Stonefury
item.description:
Instant

Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [cmr] Sparktongue Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [cmr] Volcanic Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

item.title: [cmr] Undying Rage
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Volcanic Torrent
item.description:
Sorcery

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Volcanic Torrent deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Ambush Viper
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [cmr] Crushing Vines
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target creature with flying.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [cmr] Fin-Clade Fugitives
item.description:
Creature — Elf Salamander Rogue

Fin-Clade Fugitives can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Encore {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Lifecrafter's Gift
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Ivy Lane Denizen
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Lys Alana Bowmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

item.title: [cmr] Monstrous Onslaught
item.description:
Sorcery

Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.

item.title: [cmr] Molder Beast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Reshape the Earth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to ten land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Ordeal of Nylea
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.

When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Scrounging Bandar
item.description:
Creature — Cat Monkey

Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Scaled Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [cmr] Sentinel Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [cmr] Stingerfling Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach

When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

item.title: [cmr] Silverback Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Ape Shaman

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Wildsize
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Strength of the Pack
item.description:
Sorcery

Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Note the converted mana cost of each card as it's put into exile.

Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Captain Vargus Wrath
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Orc Pirate

Whenever Captain Vargus Wrath attacks, Pirates you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.

item.title: [cmr] Hamza, Guardian of Arashin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Warrior

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
